name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】ARCANA - Mori Calliope's Birthday Concert! With Many Guests! [YRySeGZNzQ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Houshou Marine perform 'Empress (Calliope ver.)'.
Mori Calliope delivers an MC segment, introducing her birthday live 'ARCANA'.

subtitles.english: Wake me up.

subtitles.original: えへん！
subtitles.english: Ahem!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、ようこそ、カリオペ誕生日ライブへ！
subtitles.english: Welcome everyone to Calliope's Birthday Live!

subtitles.original: Welcome everybody to this year's live show, ARCANA!
subtitles.english: Welcome everybody to this year's live show, ARCANA!

subtitles.original: The Arcana is the means by which all is revealed.
subtitles.english: The Arcana is the means by which all is revealed.

subtitles.original: Is it not, Dead Beats? I know you guys know what I'm talking about, right?
subtitles.english: Is it not, Dead Beats? I know you guys know what I'm talking about, right?

subtitles.original: Check it out, first of all, this stage.
subtitles.english: Check it out, first of all, this stage.

subtitles.original: ステージ、素敵ですね。
subtitles.english: The stage is wonderful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Look, we're in a crystal ball! Can you believe it?
subtitles.english: Look, we're in a crystal ball! Can you believe it?

subtitles.original: This was all Mori's idea, which it might have been a bad idea...
subtitles.english: This was all Mori's idea, which it might have been a bad idea...

subtitles.original: ...'cause I don't know how we're gonna get out of here. Well, we'll figure it out.
subtitles.english: ...'cause I don't know how we're gonna get out of here. Well, we'll figure it out.

subtitles.original: But in the meantime, guess what? I have assembled all of these tarot cards here.
subtitles.english: But in the meantime, guess what? I have assembled all of these tarot cards here.

subtitles.original: Tarot cards featuring my friends!
subtitles.english: Tarot cards featuring my friends!

subtitles.original: For example, right, we have Marine-senchou, who I just performed Empress with.
subtitles.english: For example, right, we have Marine-senchou, who I just performed Empress with.

subtitles.original: Yes, yes, a bit of artwork on her card over here for The Empress, so lovely.
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, a bit of artwork on her card over here for The Empress, so lovely.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much to Gumshrue for drawing these beautiful illustrations.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much to Gumshrue for drawing these beautiful illustrations.

subtitles.original: Um, but yeah, I decided to pick Arcana that, like, fit my friends.
subtitles.english: Um, but yeah, I decided to pick Arcana that, like, fit my friends.

subtitles.original: But then I took it a bit further and decided, "What if we sang a bunch of Mori songs?"
subtitles.english: But then I took it a bit further and decided, "What if we sang a bunch of Mori songs?"

subtitles.original: そうですね、今日は森カリオペだけの曲、歌います！
subtitles.english: That's right, today I'll sing only Mori Calliope songs!

subtitles.original: That's right!
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: This show is Mori songs only. That's right.
subtitles.english: This show is Mori songs only. That's right.

subtitles.original: And I tried to pick songs that fit the Arcana and then matched them up with talents...
subtitles.english: And I tried to pick songs that fit the Arcana and then matched them up with talents...

subtitles.original: ...that I thought also fit the Arcana.
subtitles.english: ...that I thought also fit the Arcana.

subtitles.original: So we have some amazing guests lined up today...
subtitles.english: So we have some amazing guests lined up today...

subtitles.original: ...and I hope that you guys will get super excited because I've been looking forward to this for so long.
subtitles.english: ...and I hope that you guys will get super excited because I've been looking forward to this for so long.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, everybody, for dropping by to be a part of this.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, everybody, for dropping by to be a part of this.

subtitles.original: And you know what? You can continue to be a part of it.
subtitles.english: And you know what? You can continue to be a part of it.

subtitles.original: How can you do that? You might ask. By using the hashtag!
subtitles.english: How can you do that? You might ask. By using the hashtag!

subtitles.original: Yes, up in one of these corners is gonna be the hashtag...
subtitles.english: Yes, up in one of these corners is gonna be the hashtag...

subtitles.original: ...it's probably over here, but it might also be over here.
subtitles.english: ...it's probably over here, but it might also be over here.
